GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: fix double list_add at iwl_mvm_mac_wake_tx_queue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 38d71acc15a2e72806b516380af0adb3830d4639, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit cfbc6c4c5b91c7725ef14465b98ac347d31f2334. For more details please see the references link.
